ComicInfo.Series: Ghost Rider / Blaze: Spirits of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Title: Fathers
ComicInfo.Summary: Fathers: Lilith finds one of her children, Skinner, who has given up his earlier savage ways and is living as a human. Lilith commands him to return to her and use his powers to kill John Blaze. While Ghost Rider is searching for Nakota Skinner attacks John. John holds his own until the Ghost Rider can return to help him. They think they have destroyed him and they leave to follow Nakota's trail, but Skinner is still alive and promising revenge on them.
